page.title: 04Subjects Studied In School
page.content: These are the subjects studied by Chandag Junior School:Maths,English, Art,Handwriting,History,Science, Geography,Topic,P.E.,Games,Reading, Music. The top two classes spend most of their time doing English,the rest of classes tend to spend most time on English and Maths. In Class 5 we do Maths every day using Alpha and Beta.We use Targets and Using Our Language for English, which we do every day.We use Marion Richardson Handwriting books.We have a maths test and spelling test on Friday morning before swimming.In the after -noon we have singing.On Monday and Wednesday we do Art and Topic.We draw, paint and make clay models.Our topic this term is the{Domesday Survey}but we also do individual work.We choose subjects such as Animals,Sport,Travel.
